name: Roggenwolf
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silver

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: The roggenwolf lets loose a howl that can only be heard inside the minds of nearby creatures. Each creature within 30 feet of the roggenwolf that isn’t an undead or a construct must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened and restrained for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending both effects on itself on a success.
actions.name: Howl (Recharge 5-6)

special_abilities.desc: The roggenwolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing and smell.
special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
